projects.name: Learning Management System
projects.description: A scalable web app built with Next.js for managing student enrollment, tuition payments, class and instructor registration, and institutional performance, with secure login and customizable themes.

projects.name: Vs Azmozesh
projects.description: A scalable web app built with Next.js for selling courses, hosting festivals, managing exams, and issuing certificates using SPA technologies.

projects.name: AI Agent
projects.description: Developed a user interface for an AI Agent and integrated it with existing systems to automate and optimize internal operations, focusing on seamless UX and smart workflows.

projects.name: Mikrotik Dashboard (HotspotX)
projects.description: SPA project integrated with Mikrotik Hotspot for user login, featuring task management, organizational news, daily updates, currency converter, crypto rates, favorites, weather display, and more...

projects.name: HotspotX Extension
projects.description: SPA project as a Chrome and Firefox extension, featuring task management, organizational news, daily updates, currency converter, crypto rates, favorites, weather display, and more...

projects.name: E-commerce Laravel API
projects.description: Scalable and robust backend API built with Laravel, supporting product catalog management, shopping cart functionality, discount and promotion handling, and secure user authentication.

projects.name: Z Platform
projects.description: Twitter's clone made with Next.js, Shadcn/UI, Tailwindcss, and Typescript.

projects.name: Z Platform Android
projects.description: Twitter's clone made with Java and Android SDK.
